==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|きょ|りゅう|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=きょりゅう}} compound {{m|ltc|居留|tr=*giu *liou}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} {{m|zh|居留|tr=jūliú}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=kan|きょうりゅう|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|きょりゅう}}

# a [[residence]], especially in a [[foreign]] [[country]]

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|tr=intrans|きょりゅう}}

# to [[reside]], to [[live]] in a place, especially in a [[foreign]] [[country]]
#: {{ja-usex|オーストラリアに'''居留'''する日本人|^オーストラリア に '''きょりゅう''' する にほんじん|Japanese people '''residing''' / '''living''' in Australia}}

====Conjugation====
{{ja-suru|きょりゅう}}

====Derived terms====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-l|居留地|きょりゅうち|kyoryūchi}}: a [[settlement]], a [[concession]], a [[place]] of [[residence]] for [[foreigner]]s; a [[reservation]], as for [[Native American]]s
* {{ja-l|居留者|きょりゅうしゃ|kyoryūsha}}: a [[foreigner]] living in a country, a [[foreign]] [[resident]]
* {{ja-l|居留民|きょりゅうみん|kyoryūmin}}: a [[foreigner]] living in a country, a [[foreign]] [[resident]]
{{der-bottom}}
